## LexicalModelCompiler.generateLexicalModelCode() method

Returns the generated code for the model that will ultimately be loaded by the LMLayer worker. This code contains all model parameters, and specifies word breakers and auxilary functions that may be required.

**Signature:**

```typescript
generateLexicalModelCode(model_id: string, modelSource: LexicalModelSource, sourcePath: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  model\_id | string | The model ID. TODO: not sure if this is actually required! |
|  modelSource | LexicalModelSource | A specification of the model to compile |
|  sourcePath | string | Where to find auxilary sources files |

**Returns:**

string
